ygData.subject: Re: How to identify Jewelry ? **Possible Spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: It is true that jade adds 5 to mana (which set in silver), as for wether it speeds up mana regen I m not sure. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ... From: Saleen
ygData.messageBody:
It is true that jade adds 5 to mana (which set in silver), as for wether it
speeds up mana regen I'm not sure.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Saleen <saleengt@...>
To: Everquest Wizards <EQ_Wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 19, 1999 5:43 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] How to identify Jewelry ? **Possible Spoiler**


>From: Saleen <saleengt@...>
>
>Hi everyone,
>
>is there anyone out there that knows of any jewelry that speeds up mana
